title: The Ashen Road
description: You intercepted a strange, metallic carrier-drone flying towards the distant Red Wastes. It was transmitting data back to a localized grid. You must follow its flight path to uncover its source.

turns.narrative: The drone's path leads into a highly irradiated sector of the Fringe. A swarm of hunter-killer drones attempts to stop your approach.
turns.choice_a: Use a heavy energy shield and push through
turns.consequence_a: The drones exhaust their batteries on your shield. They fall dead from the sky.
turns.choice_b: Hack their targeting matrix to turn them against each other
turns.consequence_b: A complex override. You succeed, saving your stamina as they blow each other to pieces.

turns.narrative: You find a buried, highly advanced metallic bunker doors buried under centuries of ash.
turns.choice_a: Melt the doors with focused arcane heat
turns.consequence_a: The magma tears through the metal, triggering the base's inner alarm sirens.
turns.choice_b: Rip the manual override wheel with sheer strength
turns.consequence_b: The gears groan and snap. The door slides open silently, avoiding the alarms.

bunker_alarmed.description: You forced your way into the bunker loudly.

conclusion: You forced your way into the bunker loudly.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
